info.name: dim_brighten_rate_01
info.description: Using 2 dim fixtures to test a dim and brighten rates. Usuing only setmultiple fixture levels for simplicity and using 30sec and 60sec dim and brighten rate for each fixture.

body.raw:
{
    "type": "Configuration",
    "fixtures": [
        {
            "type": "dim",
            "assignedname": "TEST_FIX_Dim_1",
            "interface": {},
            "interfacename": "rpdg-pwm",
            "outputid": "1",
            "image": "/images/light_eg1.jpg",
            "candledim": false,
            "parameters": {
                "dimoptions": "1",
                "dimrate": "30",
                "brightenrate": "30",
                "resptoocc": "100",
                "resptovac": "0",
                "resptodl50": "-1",
                "resptodl40": "-1",
                "resptodl30": "-1",
                "resptodl20": "-1",
                "resptodl10": "-1",
                "resptodl0": "-1",
                "daylightceiling": "-1",
                "manualceiling": "-1",
                "daylightfloor": "-1",
                "manualfloor": "-1"
            },
            "level": 0,
            "previousvalue": null,
            "lastupdated": "2017-04-11T21:33:43.235Z",
            "powerwatts": "0.00",
            "daylightlimited": false,
            "status": 0,
            "boundinputs": []
        },
        {
            "type": "dim",
            "assignedname": "TEST_FIX_Dim_2",
            "interface": {},
            "interfacename": "rpdg-pwm",
            "outputid": "2",
            "image": "/images/light_eg1.jpg",
            "candledim": false,
            "parameters": {
                "dimoptions": "1",
                "dimrate": "60",
                "brightenrate": "60",
                "resptoocc": "100",
                "resptovac": "0",
                "resptodl50": "-1",
                "resptodl40": "-1",
                "resptodl30": "-1",
                "resptodl20": "-1",
                "resptodl10": "-1",
                "resptodl0": "-1",
                "daylightceiling": "-1",
                "manualceiling": "-1",
                "daylightfloor": "-1",
                "manualfloor": "-1"
            },
            "level": 0,
            "previousvalue": null,
            "lastupdated": "2017-04-11T21:34:17.333Z",
            "powerwatts": "0.00",
            "daylightlimited": false,
            "status": 0,
            "boundinputs": []
        }
    ],
    "levelinputs": [],
    "contactinputs": [],
    "groups": [
        {
            "name": "All",
            "type": "brightness",
            "fixtures": [
                "TEST_FIX_Dim_1",
                "TEST_FIX_Dim_2"
            ]
        }
    ],
    "scenes": [],
    "enocean": [],
    "scenelists": [],
    "occupiedstate": 0,
    "sitezip": 97219,
    "sitelatt": 45.4736058,
    "sitelong": -122.7349017
}

exec: tests["Value of pwm output 1 is greater than 0 but less than 10 "] = (out1<10&&out1>0);
tests["Value of pwm output 2 is greater than 0 but less than 10 "] = (out2<10&&out2>0);
tests["Value of pwm output 1 is greater than 15 but less than 30 "] = (out1<=30&&out1>15);
tests["Value of pwm output 2 is greater than 7 but less than 15 "] = (out2<15&&out2>7);
tests["Value of pwm output 1 is greater than 50 but less than 65 "] = (out1<65&&out1>50);
tests["Value of pwm output 2 is greater than 25 but less than 33 "] = (out2<33&&out2>25);
